item.title: about
item.description: My name is Toni Piz√†. I’m a developer with a wide range of interests, mainly involved in algorithmics, web architecture, distributed systems and machine learning. I have a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science by the University of the Balearic Islands (UIB), and I have coursed a master degree in Computing by the Polytechnic University of Catalonia (UPC), but i haven’t read my master thesis. I worked as a backend developer and devops engineer.
